name: Chocolate Cream Dream
author: Don and Clara Essner Family

ingredients.name: pkg. 12 oz. semi sweet chocolate chips
angel food cake broken into pieces

instructions: Melt chocolate chips over low heat. Beat in water until smooth. Beat in egg yolks one at a time. Cook over medium heat until thickened. Pour into large bowl and cool 15 minutes. Beat egg whites until frothy, then beat in sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time. Beat until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream, egg whites, and nuts into chocolate mixture. Arrange cake pieces in a buttered 9 x 13 inch dish. Pour chocolate mixture over cake. Sprinkle nuts over top of cake and refrigerate.
